mention.text: the criminal drug mafias operating in colombia
`` the industrial and political oligarchy '' in response
the alleged disappearance of several of their accomplices
`` the extraditables , '' spokesmen for the mafias
the criminals , who again described themselves as a `` political-military '' organization
our main motive for the war
